title: 조건문 혼합 패턴 — 0/1/2형 실제 사용
intent: 조건문 0형, 1형, 2형을 실제 상황에서 적절히 선택하여 자연스럽게 사용한다.
lexset: fact, possibility, advice, regret, warning, prediction, suggestion, consequence

seeds.en: If you boil water, it evaporates.
If it rains, I'll stay home.

seeds.kr: 돈이 있다면 새 차를 살 텐데.
seeds.en: If I had money, I would buy a new car.

seeds.kr: 일찍 오면 좋은 자리 구할 수 있어.
seeds.en: If you come early, you can get a good seat.
If I were you, I would apologize.

seeds.kr: 늦지 않으면 영화 볼 수 있어.
seeds.en: Unless you're late, you can watch the movie.
If you study hard, you succeed.
If I had time, I would go with you.
If it doesn't rain, we'll go on a picnic.
If I were healthy, I could go hiking.
